body: 那 這本本哪邊才買的到呢?

@Sugoiyah

Short summary:

The guy work as a sexline operator for female. Anyways this loli middle schooler girl "Swallow" or Jin Zhi (well her name has same sound like Swallow in Chinese) calls him and he gave her three different scenario, first was a home tutor, second was a rape story in school and the third was a public toilet rape. 

Anyways they recognized each other in the bus. Also the guy was reluctant to go out with her in fear of being called a Lolicon.

In school she ask a friend who is supposed to be homosexual how to do a blowjob to a guy. 

The girl and the phone sex guy went out to a date, the girl make up a lame excuse saying she forgot her home keys and her dad won't be back home tomorrow or that she pretend to call her friends. She stayed over at his place, they have sex. They wake up and have another round in the morning. The End.
Seems great! Can someone translate the text though?
Kinda rare and may I say refreshing to see hentai from Taiwan or China (like the last one made by Heiqing Langjun).
